name: Whiteboarding template
description:
• Don't you know how to start with a whiteboarding challenge during a product design interview?
  • You got to the final interview and you don't know how to prepare for a design whiteboarding challenge? 
  • Do you need to plan out your strategy beforehand you will start to create your new product? 


Use the Whiteboarding template to present to interviewers your best design thinking, design process and show them that you know how to define problems and possibilities to resolve them! 


Thanks to this template you can describe better your design process (which is mandatory in a whiteboarding session). the template will enable you to develop your ability to tell stories better and also bring your host right into the heart of the problem and solution.
